name: Peasant Militia
uniques: +10% [Combat Strength] when fighting on tiles with [Farm] improvement
+10% [Combat Strength] when fighting near cities with [Walls]
description: The Peasant Militia symbolizes Bohemian resilience, representing common folk rising to defend their homeland. Primarily tasked with labor, these militias can stand up to invaders with surprising strength, especially when defending their farms, hills, or cities fortified with walls. Their knowledge of the land grants them defensive advantages, making them a key unit in Bohemian resistance.
